item.title: Militia SFML (CLOSED SOURCE)
description: This game contains large amount of code and implementation of skills and knowledge in software development, including MVC Architecture, Client-Server Architecture, Observer Pattern, Abstract Factory Pattern, and more.
This game also consists of features such as UI framework, Game Engine, Multiplayer, and more.
This game gains the most amount of focus and priority compared to other projects.
This game has a lengthy development progress to ensure maintainable codebase before implementing actual gameplay features and avoid technical debt.
Is accompanied with a website called Militia SFML Documentation.
Built with C++ & SFML
note: Any screenshots of this section must be used in accordance to DATA PRIVACY ACT OF 2012 or the REPUBLIC ACT OF 10173. AN ACT PROTECTING INDIVIDUAL PERSONAL INFORMATION IN INFORMATION AND COMMUNICATIONS SYSTEMS IN THE GOVERNMENT AND THE PRIVATE SECTOR, CREATING FOR THIS PURPOSE A NATIONAL PRIVACY COMMISSION, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES

item.title: EightQueensPuzzle (CLOSED SOURCE)
description: This app strives to solve the eight queens problem by guessing the algorithm.
This app is derived from Militia SFML. It uses the same technologies but with unique features such as multithreading.
Unique features are soon merging with DzergeroEngine.
